General.Name: CHC Healthcare Group
General.Description: CHC Healthcare Group, together with its subsidiaries, provides a range of healthcare management services in Taiwan and internationally. It sells, installs, maintains, leases, and distributes medical equipment. The company is also involved in the provision of business management consultation and education training; elderly care business; and radiation sterilization business. In addition, it offers a range of equipment in the areas of radiation oncology, neurology, medical imaging, ophthalmology, and surgery. The company was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.
